channel.title: 判空 on 博客
channel.description: Recent content in 判空 on 博客

item.title: 注解: NotBlank NotEmpty的使用
item.description: @NotBlank @NotEmpty (javax.validation.constraints.NotBlank) 接口标明 org.springframework.validation.annotation.Validated 注解 要校验的对象标明 javax.validation.Valid 注解 要校验的对象属性标明 javax.validation.constraints.NotBlank 注解 示例： public class Demo{ // 接口操作 @PostMapping("/demo") @Validated public Wrapper<Response> demo(@RequestBody @Valid Request request) throws Exception { Response response = method(request); return WrapMapper.<Response>ok().result(response); } public class Request { @ApiModelProperty("开始日期") @NotBlank(message = "开始日期不能为空") private String begDate; @ApiModelProperty("结束日期") @NotBlank(message = "结束日期不能为空") private String endDate; } }
